topics.title: Conditional Statements
topics.description:
- Conditional statements control program flow.
- Use if-else to make decisions.
- Compare values with operators.
- Essential for logic handling.

topics.title: Loops
topics.description:
- Loops repeat code until a condition is met.
- Types include for, while, do-while.
- Avoid infinite loops with care.
- Key for repetitive tasks.

topics.title: Arrays and Strings
topics.description:
- Arrays store multiple values.
- Strings are sequences of characters.
- Support operations like slicing.
- Used for data manipulation.

topics.title: Stack and Queue
topics.description:
- Stack uses LIFO; Queue uses FIFO.
- Key for algorithms like traversal.
- Manage data efficiently.
- Simple yet powerful structures.

topics.title: Basic Sorting Algorithms
topics.description:
- Sorting organizes data in order.
- Includes Bubble, Selection Sort.
- Impacts query performance.
- Essential for data processing.

topics.title: Linked List
topics.description:
- Linked List links nodes with data.
- Flexible for insertions, deletions.
- Used in dynamic data structures.
- Efficient for certain tasks.

topics.title: Binary Search
topics.description:
- Binary Search finds items fast.
- Works on sorted data, O(log n).
- Splits search space in half.
- Requires pre-sorted input.

topics.title: DFS and BFS
topics.description:
- DFS explores deep; BFS explores wide.
- Used for graph and tree traversal.
- BFS finds shortest paths.
- Key for search algorithms.

topics.title: Authentication
topics.description:
- Authentication verifies user identity.
- Uses passwords or tokens.
- Ensures secure system access.
- Critical for app security.

topics.title: Authorization
topics.description:
- Authorization controls resource access.
- Defines user permissions.
- Uses roles or policies.
- Enhances system security.
